font_line_height=”1″][/split_line_heading][vc_column_text]Started by the Playfair Capital team in 2019, FFOH has brought together 1600 founders for 6,700 one-to-one mentoring and pitch meetings with over 180 investors across nine editions to date.

Read more about the FFOH initiative here.

This year together with Slush — FFOH will gather 25 female founders to meet and network with 25 top European VCs at the heart of the Slush
